properties.script:
import requests
import base64

item = requests.get('$workflow.definition_workflow_01VHXM4PQBQJT6oNlL9IOC361rjmIRuK6jx.input.variable_workflow_01VHXNTA2TMRG4X92R4AwExi1eeaH8T79vF$')

if item.status_code != 200:
    raise 'Could not access logo, using default'

encoded = 'data:image/png;base64,' + base64.b64encode(item.content).decode('utf8')

properties.script:
import json
import sys

data = json.loads(sys.argv[1])
table = json.loads(sys.argv[2])

data['options'].append({'value': table['name'], 'label': table['name']})
output = json.dumps(data)
